Job Posting:175053 - Position: W26 IT Software QA Co-Op 175053 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 11/18/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 11/04/2025 02:54 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country FGF Brands 1295 Ormont Drive Toronto M9L 2W6 Ontario Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 IT Software QA Co-Op 175053 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: IT Software QA Co-Opv (Winter 2026) Job ID: 2025-21375 Get ready for a Naan-Traditional placement experience! We're not your average bakery. We're a team of passionate thinkers and doers that are challenging the idea of what a bakery can be. We operate like a startup, powered by creativity and a 'roll up your sleeves' mentality, to give our customers the best possible product Job Summary An Innovative Software Quality Assurance Co-op to test various in-house applications and help research innovative solutions while working under the guidance of a QA manager. This co-op will become a key element in supporting development teams by help performing code review and validating that the code would match up to standards. Post test case creation and functionality/UI testing and documentation would be required. You will be supported by the IT team (Dev and QA), who are responsible for server- side application logic and integration of the front-end work. Key Responsibilities • Help testing applications with respect to requirements • Create test cases and traceability matrix covering all requirements • Attend and participate in daily standups • Follow new and emerging technologies and help research better and innovative solutions • Report to a QA Manager and pick up random QA requests for different applications • Can confidently bring new ideas to the team • Experience with agile usability and agile methodologies a plus • Work with our QA and Dev teams to ensure compatibility and quality of applications • Work closely and collaborate with other developers and team members, communicating effectively and working together to reach defined goals and meet deadlines In compliance with Ontario's Bill 190, we confirm that this posting represents a current, existing vacancy within our organization. Job Requirements Key Qualifications • Post-secondary education in Computer Science or related discipline • Previous co-op experience considered an asset • Software Testing knowledge about all aspects of the Software Development Life Cycle • Knowledge of accessibility requirements on the web • Knowledge of Agile/Scrum • Knowledge of all aspects of the Software Development Life Cycle • Self-driven and comfortable in a fast-paced environment Good communication skills and team spirit • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careerscoopinternen-fgfbrands.icims.com/jobs/21375/it-software-qa-co-opv-%28winter-2026%29/job Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
